heading: HB00168
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS HOSPITAL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on HEALTH since 2019-07-23
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00168
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE OVERSEAS FILIPINO WORKERS HOSPITAL AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Seeks to ensure the availability, accessibility and affordability of quality health care for OFWs and their dependents to protect the interest and promote the well-being of OFWs as recognition of their importance and contribution to economic development and national building.
ALIAS NAME : “Overseas Filipino Workers (OFW) Hospital Act or OFW Hospital Act.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, ANGELINA "HELEN" D.L. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2019-07-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Yap (V.) (000 2019-09-02)2. Sy-Alvarado (000 2019-09-10)

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
